programmes.show_description: Johnny becomes too invasive in Alexis' romantic life; Moira's interview with People magazine leaves the townspeople offended.
One of Moira's former producers suggests a reboot of her old soap Sunrise Bay. Alexis watches the show to study its politics and gives Moira some sage advice.
The Roses struggle to participate in an Escape Room at David and Patrick's Bachelor Party when their personal dilemmas become a distraction.
The family waits anxiously as Stevie, Johnny and Roland head to a pitch meeting.

Helena, Andy, Carly and Tony compete in the quiz, hosted by Jason Manford.

Nadia Sawalha from "Loose Women" and her dog face the agility course.

Returning for an impressive 28th season, this primetime vocal competition continues to seek out exciting new singers based solely on their amazing voices.
Ross' ex and her lesbian lover tie the knot, providing Monica with a job catering the wedding; the spirit of a massage client possesses Phoebe.
Ross discovers Marcel's career in commercials while visiting him in California; Joey's first fan turns out to be a delusional stalker.
Rachel and Monica compete for the affections of Jean-Claude Van Damme on a movie set; Chandler meets a former schoolmate who seems hot for him.
After getting his big break, Joey pays Chandler back; Monica and Rachel's prom video reveals Ross' feelings for Rachel, as well as Monica's former girth.
Ross and Rachel consummate their new relationship in the display area of the museum; Monica begins dating a handsome older doctor.

Cooking competition in which professional chefs select an amateur partner to work with in the final. Michelin-starred chef Galton Blackiston makes his decision.
A pair of childhood sweethearts seeks the assistance of a surrogate to get the child they are hoping for; a policewoman searches for love in her life.
Prestige Pawnbrokers specialise in pawning luxurious and costly objects. They open their doors to reveal the hidden world of high-end pawnbroking.

Graham Norton is getting up close and personal with various celebrities on his famous sofa.
Keith from Cornwall hopes to get a golf ball-sized lump removed from the back of his neck; Hayley recalls memories of childhood skin problems for Dr Dev.
Five celebrities compete against five friends through challenges that are created from the assumed abilities of the celebrity contestants.
Comedy series. David comes to a hard decision about where he is going to live, and Moira is on the receiving end of some unexpected news.
Comedy series. In the season finale, David gets stressed about the weather on his wedding day. Thankfully, his family are on hand to make everything right.
